name: Proof_324 — Early Morning Temperature & Humidity Under Overcast Sky (2025-12-13 07:04)
description:
Early morning environmental observation at MaMeeFarm.
The sky was dark and overcast, with the atmosphere suggesting possible rainfall.
Temperature and humidity were recorded on-site as part of continuous daily environmental monitoring.
This record reflects real-world conditions without intervention, captured as-is in the early hours of the day.
